report.title: EBMS Occurrence Download Report 2
report.description: Lists saved occurrences. Normally invoked easy download page. Version 2 of this report collects all samples relating to transects you are assigned to unless you are an admin (the_user_id provided as 0).
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id and w.deleted=false JOIN samples sc on sc.id=o.sample_id and sc.deleted=false JOIN samples sp on sp.id=sc.parent_id and sp.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON sp.location_id=l.id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON l.id=lav.location_id AND lav.deleted=false AND lav.location_attribute_id=#alloc_id# JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id JOIN locations l2 ON sc.location_id=l2.id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist# AND (#user_id# = 0 OR (sp.created_by_id=#user_id# OR lav.int_value = #cms_user_id#))

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: loc2attrs
param.description: Comma separated list of section sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: smp2attrs
param.description: Comma separated list of section sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: cms_user_id
param.description: Enter the CMS ID of the user

param.name: alloc_id
param.description: Select the attribute used to allocation locations to the user

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#the_user_id#' AND o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: belongs_to_site
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END
